author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: What the Most Attractive Female Lips Look Like, According to Science - Ideal Female Lips
text:
In the age of the selfie, more women than ever are looking for ways to perfect their poutsâ€”which might be why a record-breaking 27,400 lip implants were performed in the United States in 2015. But what does the "perfect" pair of female lips really look like? According to new research published in JAMA Facial Plastic Surgery, they're (mostly) more natural-looking than you might think.
 TODAY reports that in their February 2017 study , researchers from University of California, Irvine showed more than 400 participants side-by-side images of young women's lips and asked them to rank each photo on a scale of one to 10, with one being the least attractive and 10 being the most attractive .
First, the participants were shown photos in which women's overall lip sizes were manipulated, to help researchers gauge the "ideal" lip surface area:
